testsuite.name: com.shopping.controller.CartControllerTest

testcase.name: getCartProducts should return list of products()
deleteProductFromCart should remove product and return updated cart()
getCartById should return cart when found()
createCart should return 400 for invalid request()
getAllCarts should return list of carts()
createCart should return created cart with 201 status()
addProductToCart should add product and return updated cart()
addProductToCart should return 400 for invalid product()
